item.title: Getting Started With hugo-geo
item.description:
Setting up and configuring hugo-geo is as simple as changing a few values in your site config.toml. Lets look at this example site’s config and go over what each of hugo-geo’s site [params] do.

If this guide doesn’t answer your question it may be covered in the Hugo documentation.

item.title: About Me
item.description: This placeholder page could be your “about me” page, where you detail your contact information, portfolio pieces, and describe yourself and your goals.

item.title: Welcome to Hugo-Geo!
item.description: Welcome to hugo-geo, a resposive theme for the Hugo static site generator. Hugo is designed for post and tutorial sections, and is perfect for personal portfolio or blog sites. Why don’t you check out the Getting Started Tutorial and find out how you can use hugo-geo and customize it to your liking.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
